md:
giải nghĩa từ "fading" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Fading (verb) - Đang phai dần, đang mờ dần
	* Meaning: Becoming weaker or less strong.
	* Example: The music was fading away as the party came to an end.
	* Related words: fade, faint, weak, dim

2. Fading (noun) - Sự phai dần, sự mờ dần
	* Meaning: The process of becoming weaker or less strong.
	* Example: The fading of the light was a sign that the battery was running out.
	* Related words: decline, decrease, weakening, deterioration

3. Fading (adjective) - Đang phai dần, đang mờ dần
	* Meaning: Becoming weaker or less strong in appearance or intensity.
	* Example: The fading colors of the sunset were a beautiful sight.
	* Related words: faint, pale, weak, dim

Note: The meaning of "fading" can vary depending on the context in which it is used.

  1. Fading (verb) - Đang phai dần, đang mờ dần

    • Meaning: Becoming weaker or less strong.
    • Example: The music was fading away as the party came to an end.
    • Related words: fade, faint, weak, dim

  2. Fading (noun) - Sự phai dần, sự mờ dần

    • Meaning: The process of becoming weaker or less strong.
    • Example: The fading of the light was a sign that the battery was running out.
    • Related words: decline, decrease, weakening, deterioration

  3. Fading (adjective) - Đang phai dần, đang mờ dần

    • Meaning: Becoming weaker or less strong in appearance or intensity.
    • Example: The fading colors of the sunset were a beautiful sight.
    • Related words: faint, pale, weak, dim

Note: The meaning of "fading" can vary depending on the context in which it is used.
